text: The 1998 Stanley Cup Finals was the championship series of the National Hockey League's (NHL) 1997â€“98 season, and the culmination of the 1998 Stanley Cup playoffs. It was contested by the Western Conference champion and defending Stanley Cup champion Detroit Red Wings and the Eastern Conference champion Washington Capitals. The winner was the Detroit Red Wings. Category:Stanley Cup Finals Category:1998 in ice hockey
title: 1998 Stanley Cup Finals
